text: Joseph John Baltake Jr. (September 16, 1945 â€“ March 26, 2020) was an American movie critic, movie historian, author of the movie blog The Passionate Moviegoer."The Films of Jack Lemmon" (Citadel Press, 1977) and "Jack Lemmon: His Films and Career" (Columbus Books, 1986) His work has been seen on Knight- Ridder, Scripps Howard News Service, and the McClatchy wire services. Baltake was born in Camden, New Jersey. Baltake died of multiple myeloma on March 26, 2020 in Haddonfield, New Jersey at the age of 74.Joe Baltake, former film critic for Philadelphia Daily News, Sacramento Bee, dies at 74 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:People from Camden, New Jersey Category:Writers from New Jersey Category:American movie critics Category:American historians Category:Deaths from multiple myeloma Category:Cancer deaths in New Jersey Category:2020 deaths Category:1945 births
title: Joe Baltake
